foreignData.name: Furchteinflößender Wurm
foreignData.text: Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält der Furchteinflößende Wurm Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Sierpe del pavor
foreignData.text: Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, la Sierpe del pavor gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Guivre d'effroi
foreignData.text: Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, la Guivre d'effroi acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Wurm Terrificante
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Wurm Terrificante ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 戦慄ワーム
foreignData.text: 上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、ターン終了時まで、戦慄ワームは破壊不能を得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ワーム・ホラー

foreignData.name: 공포웜
foreignData.text: 대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 공포웜은 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다.

foreignData.name: Vorme do Medo
foreignData.text: Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Vorme do Medo ganha indestrutível até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Ужасный Вурм
foreignData.text: Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Ужасный Вурм получает Неразрушимость до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 恐怖亚龙
foreignData.text: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，恐怖亚龙获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 恐怖亞龍
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，恐怖亞龍獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。

name: Dreadwurm
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Dreadwurm gains indestructible until end of turn.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Dreadwurm gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
